name: Block Wars (itch)
description:
How to play:

- You control the spaceship with your mouse;

- Collect those falling-from-the-sky blocks. The green ones will protect you from damage, the red ones will attack for you.

- Enemies are OP and they only die by being shot at;

- You die as soon as you get hit, so find protection.

Notes: Your weapon shots might destroy yourself and your very own defences, so be careful and think strategically.
